import React from 'react'; import Link from '../../Link'; import '.RepositoryItem.css'; const RepositoryItem = ({ name, url, descriptionHTML, primaryLanguage, owner, stargazers, watchers, viewerSubscription, viewerHasStarred, }) => (

{name}

{stargazers.totalCount} Stars
{ primaryLanguage && (Language: {primaryLanguage.name}) }
)
